inclusion.criterion: confirmed BAV by TTE computed tomography or MRI
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Adults benefiting from a social security scheme
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: having received information on the research
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with a syndromic form of BAV: Loeys-Dietz syndrome
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with a syndromic form of BAV: Turner syndrome
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with a syndromic form of BAV: Williams-Beuren syndrome
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient with a syndromic form of BAV: Shone syndrome
exclusion.label: not_met
